Name: Slow Negroni
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: As the name suggests, this is a classic Negroni with sloe gin introduced as a fourth ingredient. Its flavour is exactly as it says on the tin – a sloe berry flavoured Negroni.
Nutrition: One serving of Slow Negroni contains 168 calories
